Paris Travel Guide
Top Attractions:
- Louvre Museum: World-famous art museum with the Mona Lisa.
- Eiffel Tower: Iconic landmark with stunning views.
- Notre-Dame Cathedral: Historic Gothic cathedral.
Tips:
- Book museum tickets in advance.
- Use the Metro for efficient travel.
Safety:
- Beware of pickpockets in crowded areas.
- Stick to well-lit areas at night.
